title: Gameday -- UPDATE FOR JAPANESE PLAYER PAGES
custom_preconds: Given there are Japan Series games

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the Gameday icon from the scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is taken to the Gameday view 
And the user can see specific team logos, game time, stadium & other relevant info appear correctly

Then the correct leadoff batter is shown

title: MLB.TV - iPhone and iPad
custom_preconds:
To test this we need to request that an MLB.TV media stream be attached to a game that is setup in QA. 
Request should be sent to Jim.O'Connell@mlb.com
The game directory would also have to sent in the request. 
Example: http://gd.qa.mlb.com/components/game/int/year_2014/month_10/day_14/gid_2014_10_14_sjpint_mlbint_1/
Must be logged in as an At Bat entitled user
OR must be part of the features
This is not a Postseason At Bat purchase feature

custom_steps_separated.content:

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then we are able to see the game listed in the EPG

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the MLB.TV stream will play successfully
